duties_responsibilities.duty: Author and present high-quality scientific papers and presentations for peer-reviewed journals and conferences
Take a leading role in implementing software systems supporting AI2’s research
Collaborate with and learn from team members across AI2, including scientists and engineers
Mentor early-career researchers and interns on their projects
Develop collaborative relationships with relevant academic, industrial, government, and standards organizations

education_certification.credential: PhD with a focus on natural language processing or a closely related area
